page.title: 18My Friday, Wombourne
page.content: My mum wakes me up at 7.40. I get up, wash, then go downstairs for breakfast. I have Kellogs Cornflakes and milk then I watch TV.AM. Mum brushes my hair and I put on my school uniform.I reach school at 8.51,go in when the bell goes then sit down quietly whilst Mrs Murray calls the register. We have spelling and tables tests.When the bell rings we go out to play for 15 minutes. Then we work on our projects until dinner time.I have school dinners in the dining room.We play on the field when we are all finished. When the register is taken we have RE till playtime. After playtime we go to Assembly. When it finishes we have a story until school finishes at 3.30. On Friday after school I visit my great-grandparents. My dad fetches me.I have a meal & go to bed at 7.30.I watch my portable tv until I fall asleep.
